```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r results='asis', echo = FALSE}
library(httr)
#test <- content(GET("https://api.github.com/orgs/ISAAKiel/repos"), as = "text")
repo_info <- content(GET("https://api.github.com/orgs/ISAAKiel/repos"))

for (i in 1:length(repo_info)){
  title_string <- paste('## [',repo_info[[i]]$name,'](',repo_info[[i]]$html_url,')',sep="")
  cat(title_string)
  cat("\n")
  cat(repo_info[[i]]$description)
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
